>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.YMGOKoZtKgJqIsAD]{Mechanic Trick}

Your AI enables you to temporarily gain expertise with weapons your allies use. As a move action, you become proficient with a type of weapon with which an ally within 30 feet is proficient. If that ally has Weapon Specialization with that weapon type, you can also apply that ally’s Weapon Specialization with that weapon type. This ability’s effects last a number of rounds equal to half your mechanic level, after which you can’t use this ability again until after you spend 1 Resolve Point to regain Stamina Points after a 10-minute rest. You must have an @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.cM54UpNXExgDSbq4]{Exocortex} to learn this trick.
